data.text: @stormrobinson Also, I’ve worked in medicine for 20 years and the tests he mentions are either super extreme or make no sense!
@stormrobinson This is ridiculous. I will never understand the obsession. We have weakened mankind over the last 20 years. Just a bunch of whiners now.

@stormrobinson Jesus, the pinned comment on that profile. Long CoVid is such a vague constellation of symptoms. I think it’s always biopsychosocial but I agree- some people have victim mentality going into CoVid & are more prone to it.
@stormrobinson Probably on their resumes too. "Triple Vaxed, Full Stack Dev, They / Them, Long Covid Sufferer"
